long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to enable your XKCD habit. (Don't worry, we don't judge.) The arrow keys allow you to navigate to the previous/next comic, and the spacebar toggles alt-text -- in short, you can do all your xkcd browsing without ever having to take your hands off the keyboard!
